Package neqsim.pvtsimulation.util

package neqsim.pvtsimulation.util
Utility classes for PVT simulations.

This package provides:

  • BlackOilCorrelations - Industry-standard black oil correlations (Standing, Vasquez-Beggs, Glaso, Beggs-Robinson, Lee-Gonzalez-Eakin) with support for field units (psia, °F, scf/STB) and SI units (bara, °C, Sm³/Sm³)
  • BlackOilUnits - Unit system enum for converting between field, SI, and NeqSim internal units
  • PVTReportGenerator - PVT report generation utilities for CCE, CVD, DLE, and separator test results

Black Oil Correlations Usage

// Field units (default)
double Pb = BlackOilCorrelations.bubblePointStanding(500, 0.8, 35, 200, true);

// SI units (bara, °C, Sm³/Sm³)
double Pb_si = BlackOilCorrelations.bubblePointStandingSI(89, 0.8, 35, 93);

// Explicit unit system
double Pb = BlackOilCorrelations.bubblePointStanding(89, 0.8, 35, 93, BlackOilUnits.SI);
